definitions.definition: a short, not very serious fight:
examples: There was a bit of a scrimmage with the reporters waiting outside.

definitions.definition: a practice game of American football, basketball, football, etc.:
examples: They played a scrimmage for fans at the practice field.

definitions.definition: to play a practice game of American football, basketball, football, etc.:
examples: He scrimmaged with the North Carolina basketball team.
